description:
Hasegawa is finally left in charge of a sushi restaurant after some very harsh training. He invites Gintoki and the others to the restaurant. The group is excited to hear that they can eat all they want, but Hasegawa skills are seriously lacking! Upon seeing Hasegawa troubled, the group decides to help him out. But Gintoki and the others are complete amateurs. They make use of their skills and struggle to make sushi, but…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaigai no Nippon Ryouriten no Aji wa Daitai Gakushoku Level / Ichido Totta Sara wa Modosanai
The Taste of Overseas Japanese Restaurants Is Generally at the Same Level as a School Cafeteria / Once You`ve Chosen a Dish, You Can`t Give It Back
海外の日本料理店の味はだいたい学食レベル / 一度取った皿は戻さない
